import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import numpy as np
np.random.seed(2021)
df1 = pd.read_csv('../input/tps21sep/submission (3).csv')
df2 = pd.read_csv('../input/tps21sep/rwb 3375 loops version 23.csv')
#df1.claim = df2.claim*0.5 + df1.claim*0.5
df2.claim = df2.claim.apply(lambda x: x + np.random.normal(0, 0.0000001))
df2.to_csv('dspyt_com.csv',index=False)
